properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 7 at 3:29PM AKST until February 10 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills to 55 below expected. Snow and
blowing snow expected. In addition, areas of poor visibility
are expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches are
expected.

* WHERE...Western Arctic Coast.

* WHEN...3 PM Saturday to 6 AM Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...East winds will develop Saturday afternoon
causing very cold wind chills. Snow and blowing snow will
develop Saturday night and Sunday as winds increase. Cold wind
chills to 55 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10
minutes to exposed skin.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods
of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM SATURDAY TO 6 AM AKST MONDAY
